name: fhgr_webp
description: Building a UI for this Netflix data set: https://www.kaggle.com/shivamb/netflix-shows

scripts.start-dev: concurrently 'npm run start-dev --prefix server' 'npm start --prefix client'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: diesdasananas
